summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hogwarts Music Studio new features. All requested features are working correctly: mobile navbar visibility and scroll behavior, stats section CMS with dynamic values, careers form with Instagram/YouTube/CV fields, and admin Content tab with Stats and Application Form Labels sections. Backend APIs working with 85.3% success rate, frontend functionality at 95% success rate.

minor_issues.issue: Existing job applications missing new fields
minor_issues.impact: Old applications don't have instagram_id, youtube_link1-3, cv_filename fields
minor_issues.root_cause: Expected behavior - existing data created before new fields were added

passed_tests: Backend API - 29/34 tests passed (85.3% success rate)
Mobile navbar (390px viewport) - hamburger menu visible and clickable
Mobile menu opens and navigation items are clickable
Navbar scroll behavior - hides on scroll down, shows on scroll up
About page stats section displays dynamic CMS values (8+, 60+, 100%)
Stats section updates reflect immediately on About page
Careers page form has Instagram ID field
Careers page form has 3 YouTube link fields
Careers page form has CV upload button
Job application submission with new fields works correctly
CV upload endpoint exists and responds correctly
Admin Content tab has Stats Section with all 6 fields (stat1_value, stat1_label, stat2_*, stat3_*)
Admin Content tab has Application Form Labels section with all 9 fields
Stats Section CMS - all fields editable and save functionality works
Application Form Labels CMS - all fields editable including Instagram, YouTube, CV labels
Admin login and Content Management navigation working
CMS changes save successfully and reflect on frontend immediately
